column6:
Inexpensive, simple alternative to a hotel/motel. Flexible check in and check outs and will do what we can to fill needs.

 Private room and bath w/ stand-up shower. Lots of shopping within walking distance! 
Very easy access to highways 151 and 1604 loop min+ to 410SeaWorld is just a block away. Full access to kitchen and laundry space!
column9: Private room and bath on far west!
